description: Manage agent skills in VS Code. Discover, install, update, and remove skills for AI coding assistants.
command.refresh.title: Refresh
command.search.title: Search Marketplace
command.installFromUri.title: Install from URL...
command.clearCache.title: Clear Cache
config.title: Agent Skills Manager Pro
config.apiUrls.description: Marketplace API endpoints used for search and trending skill queries.
config.defaultAgents.description: Default target agents used when installing skills.
config.cacheMaxSize.description: Maximum local cache size in MB for downloaded SKILL.md files (default: 50).
config.cacheExpiryDays.description: Number of days before cached SKILL.md files expire.
config.skipInstallPrompts.description: Skip installation prompts and use default agents/scope directly.
